remarks: Deduction for weak dominance by a Cartesian product. _MOVABLE_ (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jul-2015.)
statement:
wdom2d2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
wdom2d2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
wdom2d2.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
wdom2d2.o $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> E. y e. B E. z e. C x = X ) $.
wdom2d2 $p |- ( ph -> A ~<_* ( B X. C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y z $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
$d x y z $.
